text: wula tatazawajuu man tazawujuh abawukum min alnisa' 'iilaa ma qad salaf minkum wamadaa fi aljahiliat fala muaakhadhat fihi. 'iina ziwaj al'abna' min zujat abayihim 'amr qubayh yafhash wayuezim qubhahu, wabighid yamaqat allah faeilahu, wabis tryqana wmnhjana ma kuntum tafealunah fi jahilitakam
